OverallGame

Class OverallGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • OverallGame.OverallGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OverallGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Since:
    2015-11-02 Handles the screen for all of the games The player will be able to chose which game to play from this screen
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Brendan, Danielle, David, Huayu and Zhanglong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
